hero.title: Manage Your Development Environment Like a Pro
hero.description: Runeya is a powerful tool for managing and launching development environments, making your workflow more efficient.

features.title: Key Features
features.synergyDescription: Runeya centralizes the management, launch, and monitoring of your development environments for maximum productivity.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Tired of having too many terminal windows open, searching for crucial information in masses of logs? Runeya lets you monitor your processes in real-time with log formatting, search, filtering, and more.

microservices.title: Development Environment Management
microservices.description: If you have anything to launch, Runeya can do it for you with intuitive controls, shortcuts, environment variables, logs, documentation, etc., all in one place.

sharing.title: Configuration Sharing
sharing.description: Share your configurations with colleagues and teams. Stop spending hours looking for the right environment variables and commands to run. Everything is in one place, encrypted and secure.

productivity.title: Increased Productivity
productivity.description: Spend less time managing application configurations and more time writing code.

detection.title: Environments
detection.description: Have different development environments? Runeya allows you to manage multiple development environments by defining different environment variables for each and easily switch between them.

debugging.title: Simplified Debugging
debugging.description: Easily track and debug issues across multiple services with centralized logging.

about.title: About Runeya
about.description: Runeya is an open-source project dedicated to making development environment management and configuration easier for developers. Our mission is to simplify complex workflows and improve productivity.

footer.description: Development Environment Management and Configuration Tool
